view_definition_query: select slt.idslumptests, slt.value, slt.date, slt.idprojects, pr.name as project, slt.idequipments, equ.name as equipment, slt.idaccounts, acc.username from consulgal.slumptests as slt left join consulgal.projects as pr on pr.idprojects = slt.idprojects left join consulgal.equipments as equ on equ.idequipments = slt.idequipments left join consulgal.accounts as acc on acc.idaccounts = slt.idaccounts
